com.alcatel_lucent.nz.wnmsextract.database
Class ALUDBUtilities

java.lang.Object
  com.alcatel_lucent.nz.wnmsextract.database.ALUDBUtilities

public class ALUDBUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Static class methods called for DB interaction. This class supercedes the FileUtilities methods which were fundamentally bugged

Version:
3
Author:
jnramsay

insertBatch

public static void insertBatch(DatabaseType db,
                               java.lang.String table,
                               java.util.ArrayList<ALUDBUtilities.ColumnStructure> col,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> data)
Batch insert method. Faster than line by line but less able to be debugged and not entirely trusted to skip only rows that cause an error in a batch rather than the whole batch

Parameters:
db - Database connector type DatabaseType
table - Target of insert
col - List of column data types
data - as a List-List-String

updatecounts - couunt of update success.failure available from BatchUpdateException message

select

public static java.lang.String select(DatabaseType db,
                                      java.lang.String table,
                                      java.lang.String field)
Canned select builder. Intended for meta/parameter extraction for example; from a list of tables select the tabel to run the next query on

Parameters:
db - Database Type to connect to
table - Table to be queried
field - The field to pull a value, the first value from
Returns:
Result as a string

                       java.lang.String operation)
Stores a log entry in the log_process table but more importantly triggers view to table copy rules

Parameters:
tablename - Table where insert/delete/update has occurred (raw_*)
operation - Modification operation on raw table
